description.p: Defines the space between the left edge of the frame and the object to the left of it.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Spacing left]* property can be used to increase the amout of space between the left edge of the frame and the item next to it, such as another control or the left side of the screen. Spacing is defined using CSS syntax. For example, 2in or 20px.
